product_name: *SG seller* Natural Rice Husk Fiber Chopping Board/100% Natural Anti-Bacterial Cutting Board
description:
*Knife-Friendly Rice Husk Fiber Cutting Board Information* - 
You must have heard advice on Knife-Friendly cutting Board is the least damaging to blade of knives. Knife-Friendly refers to a cutting board that protects the tip of the knife blade. So the fine cut marks on the cutting board is a way to protect the tip of the knife blade. So, you should use a good Knife-Friendly cutting board that does not cause mold even if there are some cut marks on the cutting board.
The most important tool in a chef‚Äôs kitchen, whether pro or home cook, is the knife. But the other important tool that makes the knife blade functional is mostly overlooked, Cutting Board. A well designed board minimizes the wear and tear of the tip of the knife blade. Yes, there are knife sharpeners available but you also need to consider the cutting board material that doesn‚Äôt dull your tip of knife blade.
The tip of the knife blade is very thin, so if there are no cut marks on the cutting board, the tip of the knife blade becomes blunt quickly. If you are looking for a cutting board that has absolutely no cut marks on the cutting board, you should buy a cutting board made of stone or glass materials. However, since a stone or glass material that quickly blunts the tip of the knife blade, so some chefs do not use it protect the tip of knife blade, but rather use a Knife-Friendly cutting Board.
If there are more cut marks on the cutting board, you can easily remove it by rubbing the cutting board surface slightly with sandpaper.

product_name: NEOFLAM Flutto Antimicrobial Cutting Board (2 Piece)
description:
NEOFLAM Flutto Antimicrobial Cutting Board (2 Piece)Contains Small & Medium sized Cutting Board
A classic design with ergonomically designed handles and edges, bringing colors to any kitchenTested Protection - Food Safe Grade
Are you fearful and concerned about the hygiene state of your kitchen cutting board in between uses? Everyone loves to eat and cook, it becomes crucial to have peace of mind that food preparation is safe, hygienic for the family. NEOFLAM cutting boards are inbuild with Microban that's proven to continuously inhibit the growth of odor & stain causing bacteria which last the lifetime of the cutting board. NEOFLAM cutting board has been awarded the World Class Product Award of Korea.
Introduction to MicrobanDid you know?Bacteria increases TWICE as much every 20minutes. One single bacteria cell can become more than 8 million cells in less than 24 hours. Microban antimicrobial technology is durable, effective and has a history of safe use. Microban solutions are built into the cutting area of the cutting board during the manufacturing process. It provides continuous 24/7 protection for the life of the product - Both on the inside and the surface. 
NEOFLAM products with Microban PROTECTS your cutting board against hostile bacteria growth. 
Product FeaturesNon-Slip HandleThermoplastic Elastomer (TPE) soft grip edges on both ends of the board provides non-slip functionality and ergonomic handle
Juice GrooveCollects excess liquids, prevents spills
Knife FriendlyCutting surface of the board does not dull knifes - keeping your knives sharp
Non-Porous & Non-AbsorbentEasy to clean 
ReversibleBoth sides of the board can be used for cutting. Prevents cross-contamination between different food types
Dishwasher Safe
BPA Free
Product DimensionBody Material: PolypropyleneSmall Sized Cutting Board - 20.3cm (W) x 29.2cm (L) x 1cm (H) Weight - 430g
Medium Sized Cutting Board - 25.4cm (W) x 36.8cm (L) x 1cm (H) Weight - 740g
Colors AvailableGrey, Pink, Green, Purple, Blue & Orange
F.A.QQ) Will there be knife marks on the cutting board?A) Yes, as the material of a knife is harder than a cutting board ; NEOFLAM Flutto cutting board also has a property whereby it does not dull knives, keeping your knife sharp at all times. Therefore, knife marks are inevitable. 
Q) Will the knife marks lead to bacteria growth?A) No, Microban is not just integrated onto the surface but the entire cutting area of the board. Hence, even in the presence of knife marks, bacteria cannot grow in them.

11. To keep Wood Board from getting the bends is by keeping it as dry as possible. and by frequently greasing it with protective oil or wax. Keeping it dry means not allowing large amounts of water to sit on the surface for too long, never letting the board soak in water. Once the board has been washed, you should dry it immediately with a dishtowel, then store it upright so both sides can air and dry out more thoroughly. Also, when you‚Äôre washing the board, be sure to wash both sides, and not just the side you used. This way the whole board gets access to equal amounts of water.
